name: IT audit
body:
## About

This page offers resources for those interested in [IT audit](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Information_technology_audit).

## Resources

 * [scripts](https://github.com/jreisinger/audit/tree/master/scripts) - various scripts used during audit engagements
 * [wiki](https://github.com/jreisinger/audit/wiki) - audit related documentation

## Feedback

Have documentation, ideas or code? Found bugs? Please edit [wiki](https://github.com/jreisinger/audit/wiki) or [file a ticket](https://github.com/jreisinger/audit/issues/new) (you have to be [signed in](https://github.com/login); there is a [free signup](https://github.com/signup/free) in case you don't have a GitHub account yet).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
